jcr:content.jcr:description: Optimize Site Search and Drive Relevant Matches
jcr:content.jcr:title: Adobe Search&Promote (Deprecated)
jcr:content.description: AdobeÂ® Search&Promote enables marketers to optimize how visitors browse, find, compare, and select relevant products and content on web and mobile sites.
jcr:content.descriptionExtended: Businesses can easily promote priority items based on business objectives and visitor intent, as well as automate merchandising and promotions activity via KPI-based triggers or metrics. Adobe Search&Promote is part of the Adobe Marketing Cloud of applications for online business optimization.
